website_summaries.verdict: These baby toothbrushes fit on mom's finger and allow you to get your baby's teeth clean before they are able to hold a brush themselves.
pros: These work for parents having a hard time with a child accepting a normal toothbrush
cons: The finger fittings run a little small and may not fit on the index finger of a larger hand

customer_reviews.title: GOOD VS BAD
customer_reviews.text: I love these! My son let’s me give him a once over with these after he brushes. I would say I have thinner fingers but there is plenty of room. These are much easier to take off if you cut a tiny hold at the top. The only complaint I have is I wish the bristles covered more surface area. I have to twist it to brush the other side. [Please hit like on my review!] Thank you :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For a grown person this thing is super small I included a picture and decide for
customer_reviews.text: I don't know who this was made for. Maybe the baby to brush his own teeth. For a grown person this thing is super small I included a picture and decide for yourself
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Great for milk tongue
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice little product. One of my twins has a problem with thick milk tongue and this is perfect for giving it a good scrub. I could not get her to open her mom wide enough for a toothbrush and I didn't want to hurt her so these were a perfect fix. She hates it but it's quick and they are very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: O'Doherty FamilyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Bought it to brush my puppies teeth
customer_reviews.text: I just got a puppy and wanted something soft to brush her teeth with, but I was having a super hard time finding dog brushes that were BPA free. So I decided to look for baby brushes and voila! So many are BPA free. It works great, is a good size (for me anyway, I have relatively thin fingers, my husband has a harder time getting it on and off, but he can do it) and is nice and soft on my little puppies teeth and gums! Yay
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Really tight on adult finger, making it difficult to massage baby’s gum
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this because my baby was teething a lot. I had high hopes it would solve his problem and give him some much needed alleviation. Unfortunately, that was not the case. Pros: It is made of silicone, so it is pretty flexible in the baby’s mouth, making it easy to move around and massage the gums. Cons: It is extremely tight on the finger (I am a woman with thin fingers and it barely fits), it won’t even go in my husband’s pinkie... making it difficult to massage our baby’s gums. Therefore, I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pollyana Lima

customer_reviews.title: Works well for our needs
customer_reviews.text: This toothbrush seems to be a good quality. I actually use it for my one month old with no toothpaste to brush his gums and tongue. If I start with his gums, he tolerates it decently well when I hurry and brush his tongue. My little one was lip and tongue tied and had to have the ties removed a few weeks ago, so when I brush his gums with this, he likes to lick it, and I think it helps him with the retraining for his tongue muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Baby really likes it! It's like a gum massage for her. It's a bit small for my husband's big hands but fit me perfectly. If you have wider fingers, you may want to reconsider this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: ***DANGEROUS***
customer_reviews.text: Sure, everything is used with supervision. It’s is designed to be on a finger while being used BUT teething babies want to fight it off you. God forbid, this gets all the way in their mouth, there is no air hole. There is no tether to yank it out either. If they find it on the floor or fight it from your hand this could be terrifying. I wouldn’t not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Martin

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for 6-12 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my baby when she started teething. For me, it seemed useless because it requires me to put it on my finger and scrub her gum, which is very uncomfortable for babies. It could be more useful older babies when they started brushing their teeth, but definitely not for beginning of teething.
customer_reviews.author: Khulan

customer_reviews.title: Our baby wasn't a fan
customer_reviews.text: Our baby wasn't a fan of this but our friends who recommended a finger brush to us had a very different experience as their child preferred this to the tooth brush. I can't fault this product for my babies preference but I did have difficult time putting this on my finger. I don't have large fingers but this was tight.
customer_reviews.author: k4

customer_reviews.title: Really Enjoy
customer_reviews.text: I really like these and I was really happy about the two pack situation. My baby loooves getting his little teeth brushed with these. We get over to him and he goes AAAAHH. He is only 1 lol. He also likes to chew on them when we are done brushing so we are very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: not as cool as you think
customer_reviews.text: they are a bit small for my fingers, and the actual brush part could be a lot bigger, hell it could wrap around the finger and would be great! I found this to be quite underwhelming once I got to use it. didn't really massage the gums like intended.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Too small to fit on my finger.
customer_reviews.text: I am a female who wears a size 7-8 ring on my ring finger. My index finger actually hurt when this was on —- much too tight, and no air holes. Not worth the trouble to return. Just very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: N. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Makes the job of mother easy when it comes to cleaning the baby tongue
customer_reviews.text: Makes the job of mother easy when it comes to cleaning the baby tongue. Its anti slippery and fast to clean too when run under hot water. I did not see any dirt sitting after using it for more than 5months on my 8 month old baby.
customer_reviews.author: Sharath Tripuraneni

customer_reviews.title: At this price, seriously why not
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old daughter smiles when I put one of these on my finger. She LOVES it. She lets me brush her teeth and gums as a kind of relaxation ritual before bed. Then wash it off with some gentle detergent and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Neon

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a fussy brusher
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old hates getting his teeth brushed and so far, these have been a huge help. We call them the "gumpinators" and they're coming to get the gump out and it WORKS! We use them after every meal when we wipe up his hands and face. It's fun and not at all the struggle regular toothbrushes were.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna L Yorty

customer_reviews.title: Good for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my two small dogs as the typical dog toothbrushes are too rough on their gums. Not only was this better for them but much easier to get into their mouths and no accidental jabs to the tonsils! Would recommend for dogs.
customer_reviews.author: kendra

customer_reviews.title: Soft and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: These are so cool! Our daughter was having some smelly breath issues. We were brushing morning and night, but she wasn't allowing us to really get in there. These allow for easier access and confidence that you are brushing where you want to be. I have found her to have quite a strong bite as well :) They are the best bang for your buck. We really recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kale Jessen

customer_reviews.title: Great for pups/dogs to.
customer_reviews.text: I received this item is great condition. It is a soft with a soft silicone/rubber feel to it. It runs a little small for my pointer finger, but I manage to make it work just fine. I am using it on a small toy poodle, which is easier than a toothbrush every night. It allows me to get her back teeth more efficiently, so it works great for her and me.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K

customer_reviews.title: Soft kids brush
customer_reviews.text: I liked the little finger toothbrush for my LO, i give it 4 stars coz it doesn’t fit too good on my pointer finger, i had to put it over a regular kids toothbrush for it to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: baby finger tooth brush
customer_reviews.text: I like it but hard to brush my daughter left back teeth this one side toothbrush. If 360 tooth brush would be easier to brush with. my daughter who is didn't like this at all and she wouldnt open her whole mouth. I had to buy a different here at amazon.
customer_reviews.author: jackie orozcoTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: No teething problems
customer_reviews.text: I had expected to clean my baby's mouth with difficulty and some gagging but nothing. She loves it and I think she thinks it's one of those teething toys. She like the feel of it. I think it feels massage like to her gums. I love these. Would recommend them as a must item for baby hampers.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Newbern

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, effective teething brush
customer_reviews.text: I liked how soft the silicone bristles were, I was worried they would be too stiff but they were surprisingly soft and gentle. I bought them for my niece and she instantly liked it, she loves to chew on my fingers and she likes to hold my hand so I wanted to get her something that would still let her hold my hand and trick her into thinking it was the same thing but obviously way more effective and cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Teethsaver
customer_reviews.text: These are a teethsaver! My little one wouldn't let me near his mouth with any toothbrush. I'd been cleaning his teeth with a cloth for months until I thought about a finger brush. He doesn't squirm or cry anymore. I'm so thankful that we've found something that will keep his little teeth healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for my 3 month olds tiny little mouth and teething gums
customer_reviews.text: Brush is soft and my little one loves it. I was able to massage her gums and she loves the feel of it on her tongue allowing us to remove the milk residue and differentiate any possible thrush. Although she is breastfed so the chances of thrush are a bit lower from what my pediatrician says and not life threatening it gives us peace of mind knowing that she is clean and enjoying it at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Raj D

customer_reviews.title: Its definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I love these toothbrushes, they are so soft & the bristles are so easy on my baby's gums. They are so easy to clean & he loves brushing his gums now ..
customer_reviews.author: Coranne Eldridge

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very nice texture
customer_reviews.text: I use it to brush my 8month baby’s new teeth after solid feed. He seems liking it too. Warning: There is a choking hazard for the size so it has to be used by an adult instead of as a teether directly held by a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Yun

customer_reviews.title: Great but small
customer_reviews.text: I love this toothbrush and so does my 10 month old! He hated having his teeth brushed before I found these. The reason for only 3 stars is because they are quite small. I have small hands and these fit my fingers perfectly however, I'd imagine they wouldnt fit on some peoples hands.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: The brush is kind of tight on finger so makes it hard to brush right. Other than that it’s a good finger brush for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Shima

customer_reviews.title: A teething must have
customer_reviews.text: My daughter looooves these. We give her gum massages with them and they protect our fingers from her sharp new teeth!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel in OR

customer_reviews.title: Cute little jumper
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and start using. safe. The only thing is the kangaroo head flops down, so you have to lift it up while trying to put baby inside. Other than that, I love it. the little joey in the pouch is too cute. :)
customer_reviews.author: Keri D

customer_reviews.title: She likes it
customer_reviews.text: My 9-month-old seems to look forward to having her tiny teeth and gums massaged after eating thanks to the Brilliant Baby Finger Toothbrush. I recommend it and will likely purchase a few to put in with my friends' baby shower gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit my pointer finger
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this for teething, not brushing. Baby prefers other tethers but I can put the numbing gel on this and into his mouth. It doesn’t quite fit my pointer finger. Usually I’d wear a size large in rubber gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Rowena

customer_reviews.title: Good way to brush teeth
customer_reviews.text: Great way to brush your baby's teeth! However, I have big fingers so it's hard to get it off my finger.
customer_reviews.author: Mom & sisters

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use on my 1 year old who only has 4 teeth. The problem is that its thin, so when she chomps me, it hurts. Also, the opening is too small for my husband's finger (he can't get it in the whole way).
customer_reviews.author: Richard Doxtator

customer_reviews.title: Baby & I both love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Baby loves chewing on it so it makes it super easy to “brush her gums”, no teeth yet! I think it feels good on her gums too. She’s been teething for months now, she’s 7mos. Rinse and boil clean and you’re good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Aryk b

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for getting gunk and food out of my one year old's teeth. The silicone bristles are very effective and perfectly sized.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschooling Mama.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to get babies used to getting their mouth washed and them ready for brushing their teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great invention
customer_reviews.text: Used this when my baby was teething and it helped a lot, soothes pain and urge to bite everything
customer_reviews.author: Chelsi Bolanos

customer_reviews.title: Makes teeth brushing easy!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves getting his teeth brushed with this finger brush. Very soft bristles and I think those and the small bumps on the opposite side provide some comfort to his gums while teething.
customer_reviews.author: KCordray

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: My son hates having his teeth brushed but these do the job. Not as flimsy as some I have used.
customer_reviews.author: lck14

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman with small hands; I wear glove size extra small. I couldn't comfortably slide this over the knuckle of my index finger. You need the bristle end to rest on your finger tip so you can apply pressure. I cut the bottom off, and that was OK, but it's still tight and a nuisance to fit and remove.
customer_reviews.author: Ratdogheads

customer_reviews.title: Baby won’t refuse it.
customer_reviews.text: Baby doesn’t refuse it. (He doesn’t like the brushes with long stick. This one works).
customer_reviews.author: coco

customer_reviews.title: Small. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is very convenient. My child doesn’t mind having his teeth brushed with it. And when he bites my finger it doesn’t hurt. It is small. I wet my finger to get it in the finger toothbrush. Maybe it’s designed for a petite woman’s finger?
customer_reviews.author: Big B

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: Was a little hard to get on my finger for a good fit where I felt comfy cleaning my babys gums
customer_reviews.author: grant

customer_reviews.title: Good for gum cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Very good for cleaning gums, teething. My daughter doesn't like hard teething toys so this is perfect for her while we use it to also clean her gums. I do wish it were a bit bigger so it wasn't a choking hazard if we're not holding it for her.
customer_reviews.author: Casiopia

customer_reviews.title: Great but tight on the finger
customer_reviews.text: My daughter, who did not like to brush her teeth, loves this finger toothbrush! It is soft and she likes the massage on the gums too. I took a star off because it is very long and my finger doesnt go to the tip of the brush because it gets very tight (I have very average sized fingers).
customer_reviews.author: A. Johansson

customer_reviews.title: Great until baby bites
customer_reviews.text: This product was great until my son got his top teeth in addition to bottom. Thats when ge started biting my fingers, trying to help me brush his teeth. Until then it was easy to use and I'd recommend is for the first few chompers.
customer_reviews.author: Yvi R

customer_reviews.title: But the brushes themselves are nice and gentle
customer_reviews.text: Very small. I don’t have large hands and have to put this on my pinky to work. But the brushes themselves are nice and gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for 👶🏽+ 🍼 highly recommended for new parents. Price not bad. Quality seems durable. See how long it last.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham R.

customer_reviews.title: Not just good for new born but for 1 year old 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Not just good for new born but for 1 year old 2 year olds at first my son wouldn't let me brush his teeth with a regular toothbrush but with these finger brushes he likes getting his teeth brushed...Thank God
customer_reviews.author: jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Quality silicone finger brush for babies
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves chewing on my finger when brushing with this little finger brush. Quality silicone stands up to little teeth gnawing. Dipped it in boiling water to sterilize after a bout of strep and didn’t fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Cleans tongue too !
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gum massager but ended up using as a tongue cleaner to clean the milk buildup ! Cheap flimsy plastic but soft and easy to use. Fits thin fingers easily.
customer_reviews.author: YS

customer_reviews.title: Tight on my finger.
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for two brushes, however they are tight on my finger. My finger starts throbbing after having it on for a few seconds. It'll be fine for a short while though.
customer_reviews.author: EmMarie

customer_reviews.title: For smaller fingers
customer_reviews.text: These will not fit big fingers. My husband is not able to use them do to having larger hands.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This product is a disaster and it is not good for teething
customer_reviews.author: Toya Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and baby loves
customer_reviews.text: Great first toothbrush to get baby used to it. My baby loves it so much I have to hide it or we'd be brushing our teeth all night!
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Eisenman

customer_reviews.title: Great beginners baby toothbrush!
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners! Use a real bristle baby toothbrush as they get older
customer_reviews.author: Naikala

customer_reviews.title: Could not use
customer_reviews.text: Too tight for my fingers and I am a small person
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Hayes

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: This finger brush is tiny. I have a finger brush for our dog that is thicker and works much better. This one gets stuck on my finger and I am ~100lb woman. At least this works as a toddler toy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Thomas

customer_reviews.title: She chuckles when I brush her teeth because the toothbrushes feel so nice -- and it's great because we have easy access ...
customer_reviews.text: My 8 month old daughter adores these. She chuckles when I brush her teeth because the toothbrushes feel so nice -- and it's great because we have easy access to her milk teeth. They're easy to clean. Great starter toothbrushes.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: may be it is a good product but it did not stay on my fingers
customer_reviews.text: Was not able to use that well with my kid... may be it is a good product but it did not stay on my fingers ...looked like my fingers were too slim for the toothbrush so I had to hold with my thumb
customer_reviews.author: Sk

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for us
customer_reviews.text: My son won't let me get it in his mouth to use it. I also wish there were bristles on all sides because i have to take it off my finger and put it back on in a different position to get the top teeth. I'm going to buy one of those tooth brush bananas and try that instead.
customer_reviews.author: MKatieT

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it more than the regular baby tooth brush.
customer_reviews.author: Star

customer_reviews.title: Great finger toothbrush.
customer_reviews.text: Having a toddler and being a bit nervous about cleaning their mouth with regular or toothbrushes for young kids due to the fear of bristles possibly breaking apart, this baby buddy finger toothbrush comes in handy for parents like myself. It's a soft silicone product that's easy to clean and won't be abrasive for young toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Dama

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I love these. They’re softer than a kids toothbrush and easier to use on babies.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but the size is very small
customer_reviews.text: It worked great as my baby's first teeth brushing experience. The only problem is the the finger is very small. My husband has to use his pinky, and it barely fits on my index finger. Neither of us can get to the tip of the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Caerul

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: Good gift although I did just see the same ones at our dollar store!!
customer_reviews.author: Molly a mathews

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this product on his son's teeth and gums (the child is one year old) and it does a great job. it is soft enough to massage those tender gums gently during those teething months and it also efficiently cleans the little teeth that have already popped out. well made and easy to slip on your finger to get the job done. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Love the Lake

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and fits normal fingers pretty well
customer_reviews.text: They are worth buying since keeping baby teeth clean is important. Very soft and fits normal fingers pretty well. If you have think fingers, it might not fit, not even the pinkie. My 17 month old child doesn't take to them, but that's because I didn't train her early enough, so starting early is key.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Easy to use and good quality material
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Cat tooth brush
customer_reviews.text: I use these to clean my cats teeth. It works well but he has sharp teeth but I wanted a product that would be soft in order to get him accustomed to the daily teeth brushing. I would definitely buy this again and it is made of great material.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Tight on finger
customer_reviews.text: They are a little tight & I have pretty average size fingers. They are easy to use & clean however, its a little uncomfortable to use since it’s tight on my finger.
customer_reviews.author: NiNi

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality although baby still doesn’t like having teeth brushed. The finger opening is a bit too small but the bristles are nice and soft.

customer_reviews.title: Has a string smell of plastic
customer_reviews.text: The plastic smells horrible. I washed it thoroughly but the smell still persists. I’m wondering if the material that is made of isn’t toxic for my baby..
customer_reviews.author: C.Con

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: We've tried several toothbrushes and they're all distracting for our toddler. This has been a lifesaver and our little guy lets us get in and brush his teeth without a problem. Works super well for us!
customer_reviews.author: StaceyA

customer_reviews.title: like teether toy
customer_reviews.text: A material similar to plastic feels to the touch. baby are more receptive use this to cleaning the gums . It would be better if the baby toothbrush head more softer
customer_reviews.author: annieo

customer_reviews.title: Other than that its great. Easier to clean my toddlers teeth
customer_reviews.text: The maker needs to make them a little bigger. They barely fit on my finger and if I have it on longer than 3-5 minutes it cuts off circulation. Other than that its great. Easier to clean my toddlers teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Almost too small for my finger
customer_reviews.text: I have smallish hands and this was almost too small for my finger. With that being said, my 5 month old, teething son likes when I rub his gums with this (since he's already used to chewing on my fingers). I wish it was a little bigger so it fits my finger more comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for our son. It is so much easier to use than a regular toothbrush for him. Super soft.
customer_reviews.author: James N Cox

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: My teeth are in bad shape, plus very senstive , great way the clean while watching tv
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and gets the job done well. Little one loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Bharath

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful with the choking hazard
customer_reviews.text: Truthfully I was not a fan of these.. the don't exactly fit your finger and I had a few times where I thought my son was going to choke on it! He liked putting his mouth on it and everything, but definitely a little scary, so I stopped using them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: My dentist recommended this type of toothbrush for my one-year-old
customer_reviews.text: My dentist recommended this type of toothbrush for my one-year-old, used along with fluoride-free toothpaste to help clean his few teeth and get him used to the idea of brushing teeth, as well as having someone's hands in his mouth for dental treatment. My son loves using this.
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Open packaging on one.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and soft for my sons gums, the fit is tight for finger but that’s a great thing beaver it is going into my sons mouth so it’s Safer that way. My clear one came opened from the side so I’m tossing that one.
customer_reviews.author: Natashafel

customer_reviews.title: Such a relief!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve tried them all- this is the teether that worked for my 4 month old! Was really able to reach the teething spots on her gums with this one. Perfect and at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: amzmom

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Only way i can get my daughter thats 2 to brush her teeth
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are great!!! Too bad my daughter still refuses to let me brush her teeth. They get stuck on my finger but no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Good, but manufacturer needs to make bigger ones.
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice product, especially for the price. Very simple and gentle and works well. But, the manufacturer really needs to make a slightly bigger version for people with thick fingers.
customer_reviews.author: FleckStar

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Brushing my infants teeth with a regular toothbrush was just not working. These have been the perfect solution.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Petry

customer_reviews.title: This is a great buy. My 8 months old loves it and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy. My 8 months old loves it and can chew on it for a long time. I gave this to him during the diaper changing. He used to struggle up during that time, but now he is too busy to chew and play with the toothbrush that he doen't mide laying there at all. Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for babies mouth
customer_reviews.text: When baby used to bite me hard I would bleed. I was trying to apply numbing gel for her teeth. But this works great! It did not hurt me while baby was gnawing on my finger. You can use it without any gel... this is wonderful to brush and massage her gums.
customer_reviews.author: Azteca

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully. However
customer_reviews.text: Using to brush my chihuahua's teeth. Works wonderfully. However, it may be too small for a man to use as it is snug this woman's pointer finger.
customer_reviews.author: M. McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog hated the toothbrush, he doesn't mind this though.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie S.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for big fingers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a teething baby. However if u have big fingers it’s a bit tight
customer_reviews.author: linda karademir

customer_reviews.title: they will probably hate this more
customer_reviews.text: If your baby hates a toothbrush, they will probably hate this more. Not bad quality though.
customer_reviews.author: Potss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Apparently this feels great on gums. I like it because it protects my fingers from those sharp little teeth!
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Handy.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used yet but looks like it will be simple and handy. Wish dust didn’t stick to it so easily but that may be the humidity here that causes it.
customer_reviews.author: KRYAN0341

customer_reviews.title: Best way to brush baby teeth!
customer_reviews.text: These finger toothbrushes are by far the easiest way to brush tiny teeth in a tiny mouth. I love that the silicone is thin enough that you can feel the teeth but thick enough that baby can bite down/chew without it being uncomfortable. They're also inexpensive enough that you can purchase a lot of them and not have to worry if one gets lost or needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes his first toothbrush
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed.... baby loves to chew on these and they seem to work effectively as proper toothbrushes too.
customer_reviews.author: DeweyDellTop Contributor: Baby

product_meta.title: Brilliant Baby Finger Toothbrush - Silicone Gum Massager and Teether Brush for Babies and Toddlers - Kids Love Them, Blue/Clear, 2 Count
product_meta.description:
Color:Blue-Clear| Size:2 CountNurture a lifetime of good oral habits with proactive oral care. Safely brush new baby's teeth and massage tender gums with Baby Buddy’s Silicone Finger Toothbrush of Brilliant Oral Care System. The program guides you with innovative oral care products that grow with your child from birth. Starting from the Foundations and through Teething & Budding, the products are designed to take care of budding baby teeth with state of the art, safe and soft products that children love to chew on. During Teeth Eruption & Development, the program progresses to distinctive round toothbrushes for ages 4 months to adults, that easily clean those hard-to-reach places where food and plaque can build up and cause oral problems. 

By simply slipping the Brilliant Finger Toothbrush over your finger you can gain full access to your baby’s mouth to softly clean, massage and soothe baby's gums and teeth. Starting from 3 months help your baby’s new teeth, gums and tongue stay plaque and bacteria free to prevent decay. This Finger Toothbrush, specifically designed for babies is 100% FDA food grade silicone and is BPA free making it completely baby-safe and easily washable. It fits snugly over any adult finger forming a protective extension of your finger. Its double sided design provides multiple purposes, as the soft brush cleans the teeth, the massaging bumps massage gums and clean the gums and tongue. As well, its soft flexible material makes it a good teether which can be chilled to relieve soreness in the baby’s mouth. Baby Buddy’s Silicone Finger Toothbrush is user friendly and offers an easy, portable oral hygiene solution. 

Give your child the gift of a lifetime of good oral care habits with the innovative Brilliant Finger Toothbrush by Baby Buddy. Check out our other Baby Buddy products because Every Baby Needs a Buddy.
feature_bullets: Finger Toothbrush part of The Brilliant Oral Care Program that grows with you and your child from birth, customized for each stage to help develop a love of brushing and good oral habits
Cleans baby’s whole mouth - soft bristles brush the teeth, massaging bumps for sore gums and to clean tongue, removing bacteria and plaque for cavity prevention
Oral Massager and Teether- baby can bite down without hurting you and can be chilled in freezer to soothe tender gums from teething
A First Toothbrush for infants 3 months and up in a variety of colors for boys or girls – dishwasher safe, easy to clean and convenient for home and on-the-go oral care!
Silicone Finger Toothbrush is high quality FDA approved food grade silicone, safe and BPA-free method of oral care designed and recommended by dentists
